# new Style(options)

**Constructor**

Creates and initializes a style object.

## Declaration

```swift
constructor(options?: StyleConstructorOptions);
```

## Parameters

- **options**: A [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/StyleConstructorOptions] object of style properties.

## Creating a style

- **StyleConstructorOptions**: Initial values of options for applying style to overlays.

items.description: Initial values of options for applying style to overlays.
